messages.message: Hi team, i understand this may be on the roadmap but how are clients handling this today: as part of a Build app run , validating data across different documents. Specific example for a bank as part of a mortgage application is ensuring the submitted payslips are in consecutive months. Using converse doesn't really help automate this at scale
You can do cross-document validations as an advanced app (Sol Eng built functionality)

:heavy_plus_sign: to Hamish’s suggestion

Also, for case management, we’re building the ability to configure cross-class validations - this doesn’t seem to exactly match your use case since you have multiple payslips that would be in the same class

Cc @Kaustubh (KD) on future extension of case management
